mistralai/Mistral-7B-Instruct-v0.1-4k_pr: In the document, Derek Shepherd is a fictional character from the ABC medical drama Grey's Anatomy. He was portrayed by actor Patrick Dempsey and made his first appearance during the first season of the show. Derek was a neurosurgeon who specializes in highly complex tumors and conditions of the brain and spine. He was known for taking on "lost causes" and "impossible" cases that most of his peers would turn down. Derek first met Meredith Grey, an intern at Seattle Grace Hospital, in the first season of the show. They began to have feelings for each other, but their relationship was complicated by the fact that Meredith's supervising resident, Dr. Miranda Bailey, discovered their relationship and disapproved of it. Despite this, Derek and Meredith eventually became a couple and had three children together.
